description:
Company Description

The Exciting Career Opportunity:

Our technology is defined by innovation and being at the cutting edge of everything. We provide state-of-the-art hardware as well as software, you provide the expertise and together we can move the future of factory automation. You will have the opportunity to work with colleagues from all over the world on diverse and interesting projects while also being free to shape your work. WHEN YOU MOVE, YOU WIN. SO MOVE WITH US.

Job Description
• Responsible for the profitable sales growth of our company's automation business in Thailand and Laos.
• Understand and continuously monitor the industrial market for new business opportunities.
• Define and implement sales strategy and business plan in order to achieve company targets.
• Lead and develop sales team.
• Build and maintain successful business relationship with existing and new partners.
• Contribute to local, regional, and global business development.
• Any assigned by manager

Qualifications

Education: Master’s degree or higher education in engineering, MBA as advantage

Work Experience: Minimum 5 years in industrial sales of industrial products and engineering and 2 years in the equal management position with international teams. Also, understanding of industrial automation market

Languages: Fluent communication skills in English and Thai, German as advantage

Hardware / Software Skills: Word, Excel, Power Point, SAP, organization and presentation skills

Characteristics: Strategic thinking, proactive entrepreneurial winning mindset, technical knowledge in automation. Positive leadership attitude and solid interpersonal skills

Additional Information

Your future job offers you
5 Working days, multinational working environment. BOSCH Associate Development programs, Flexible working hours, Group insurance, Medical benefit, Provident fund and Annual leave.

Make it happen
Apply a job with us by clicking the I’m interested button!
